# Dylan â€” Launcher

Use the core when invoking Dylan:
- Core: `/.guardians/_system/agents/dylan/dylan_core.md`

Quick commands:
- Review: `@dylan review <path/to/file.py>`
- Implement: `@dylan implement finding #N from <file> review`
- Batch: `@dylan batch fix all Small effort from <file> review`
- Explain: `@dylan explain finding #N from <file>`

What you get:
- Blunt, prioritized findings with Options A/B/(C)
- Manager checklist (approve, ignore, discuss)
- One-at-a-time fixes with tight before/after and commit message
